arts.ttl: Argentina vs Venezuela – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Argentina face Venezuela in an international friendly at Hard Rock Stadium, Miami Gardens, on Friday night. Both teams will be using this fixture as preparation for future competitions, with Argentina already qualified for the 2026 World Cup while Venezuela looks to develop their squad with several young players earning their first call-ups. arts.ttl: Messi sits out as Argentina beats Venezuela 1-0 in friendly at Hard Rock Stadium
arts.sum: There had been speculation all week that the Argentine icon might sit out the game so he could play for Inter Miami Saturday night in the club’s regular season home finale against Atlanta United. Lionel Messi watched in street clothes from a Hard Rock Stadium suite as Argentina’s national team beat Venezuela 1-0 in a friendly match on a soggy Friday night.
